mapper.select: select a.tag_id, a.tag_name, a.tag_icon from airbnb_tags a, airbnb_acc_tags b where a.tag_id = b.tag_id and b.acc_no = #{value}

select reservation_no as no, user_no as userNo, acc_no as accNo, reservation_status as reservationStatus, check_in_date as checkInDate, check_out_date as checkOutDate, adult_number as adultNum, children_number as childrenNum, infant_number as infantNum, PET_NUMBER as petNum, MESSAGE_TO_HOST as messageToHost, RESERVATION_CREATED_DATE as createdDate, RESERVATION_UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate, ACC_SERVICE_FEE as serviceFee, ACC_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, ENTIRE_PAYMENT as entirePayment, LEFT_PAYMENT as leftPay from airbnb_reservations where acc_no = #{value}
select * from airbnb_accommodations where acc_created_date = (select MAX(acc_created_date) from airbnb_accommodations)
select type_no as no, type_name as name, image_name as imageName from airbnb_types where main_type is null and privacy_type = 'N' order by no
select type_no as no, type_name as name, image_name as imageName, type_description as description from airbnb_types where main_type = #{value} order by type_no
select type_no as no, type_name as name from airbnb_types where privacy_type = 'Y' order by type_no
select tag_id as id, tag_name as name, tag_icon as icon from airbnb_tags order by tag_id
select * from AIRBNB_ACCOMMODATIONS where user_no = #{no} and acc_status = '등록미완'
select * from AIRBNB_ACCOMMODATIONS where user_no = #{no} and acc_status != '등록미완'

select Accommodations_seq.nextval from dual
insert into airbnb_accommodations (acc_no, user_no, acc_status) values (#{accNo}, #{user.no}, #{status})

INSERT INTO airbnb_acc_rooms (room_no, acc_no, room_bedroom, room_bed, room_bathroom) SELECT #{accNo}, #{accNo}, #{bedroom}, #{bed}, #{bathroom} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM airbnb_acc_rooms WHERE acc_no = #{accNo})

insert into airbnb_acc_photos (image_no, acc_no, image_name, image_cover) values (#{imageNo}, #{accNo}, #{name}, #{cover} )
